response:
A young woman with objective lesions disseminated in space (optic nerve, cerebellum, spinal cord) is most consistent with relapsing–remitting multiple sclerosis; optic neuritis plus myelopathy also raise NMOSD and MOGAD; inflammatory granulomatous, autoimmune, infectious, and structural mimics must be excluded.

differential_diagnosis = ["Relapsing\u2013remitting multiple sclerosis", "Neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder (AQP4-IgG positive)", "MOG antibody-associated disease", "Neurosarcoidosis", "Systemic autoimmune disease with CNS involvement (e.g., SLE/Sj\u00f6gren\u2019s)", "CNS vasculitis", "Infectious mimics (HIV, syphilis, Lyme)", "Spinal cord compression (thoracic)"]
